Title: XSS in Consumes/Produces Parameter
Description: Swagger-UI contains a cross site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the `consumes` and `produces` parameters of the swagger JSON document for a given API. A maliciously crafted swagger JSON doc can be loaded via the URL query-string parameter `url`.
NotImpacted: All versions before 2.1.4-m1, all versions starting from 2.1.5-m1
